A pulsing point light takes five arguments: :''1'': Red value of the light :''2'': Green value of the light :''3'': Blue value of the light :''4'': Minimum radius of the light, in map units :''5'': Maximum radius of the light, in map units In addition, the angle is used to determine the pulse time, in tics (there are 35 tics per seconds). All dynamic lights can be toggled on and off with [[Thing_Activate]] and [[Thing_Deactivate]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PointLightPulse : {{Class|PointLight}} { {{Property|DynamicLight.Type}} "Pulse" }
